name: Sinhala Stickers & Sticker Creator (WAStickerApps)
description: This app lets you install new amazing and interesting Sinhala WhatsApp Stickers on your WhatsApp instant messaging application.           WhatsApp        .  Send funny Sinhala stickers to your friends!   Create your own stickers using images in your gallery!         !          !    How to use 1. Open the app and tap on the Sinhala Stickers Button. 2. Tap on the View all button on the sticker pack you want. 3. Tap the Add to WhatsApp button on the top right side. 4. Open WhatsApp and tap the emoji keyboard button near the input area. 5. Tap sticker icon at the bottom. 6. Now send your favorite Sinhala stickers to your friends!     1.       . 2.           . 3.     WhatsApp     . 4. WhatsApp   Emoji   . 5.     . 6.           !  700+ Stickers, with 50+ sticker packs   50      700+   MORE STICKERS ARE ON THE WAY!   Download now for FREE!    Send them to your friends and family!  PLEASE NOTE: Please install the latest version of WhatsApp before adding stickers packs.  :      WhatsApp     .  If you need to promote your brand with the branded sticker pack, please contact us on Email : info@nebuloapps.com or connect with us on : http://www.nebuloapps.com/community Live Chat : http://www.nebuloapps.com    2020 NebuloApps.
